example: According to the report, sales grew last month.
tr: Raporlara göre satışlar geçen ay arttı.

example: We are ahead of schedule this week.
Try to read at least one page a day.
tr: Günde en az bir sayfa okumaya çalış.

example: Come here at once, please.
